A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went in with very low expectations. And was still dissapointed. Terrible plot\, even worse casting\, and pretty bad acting. The one redeeming factor\, and the only reason I gave it 1 star instead of 1/2 of a star is because of the action scenes. Every scene change I hoped it would end\, but it just kept going. Also\, I'm not quite sure they understand the physics of space... Honestly\, I'm not a huge Star Wars buff\, but I can tell the difference between a good and a bad movie. This was one of the worst\, most dissapointing movies I've ever seen.
